title: ACLTwo – Know your teams ( East ) | خبرگزاری ورزش ایران – ایپنا
body_text:
Group E
Sanfrecce Hiroshima (JPN)
– ۳rd in 2023 J1 League
– ۳-time league winners
– ۵ ACL appearances
– ۱st ACL Two appearance
Sydney FC (AUS)
– ۲۰۲۳ Australia Cup champions, 2nd title
– Record 5-time A-League Men champions
– ۷ ACL appearances
– ۱st ACL Two appearance
Kaya FC-Iloilo (PHI)
– ۲۰۲۴ Philippines Football League champions – ۲nd title and 2nd in a row
– ۲۰۲۳ PFL Cup winners – record 3rd title
– ۱-time AFC Cup Round of 16 (2016)
– ۴th ACL Two appearance
Eastern (HKG)
– ۲۰۲۳/۲۴ Hong Kong FA Cup winners – ۶th title
– ۱-time league champions
– Reached inter-zone play-off semi-finals in 2022 AFC Cup
– ۴th ACL Two appearance
Group F
Zhejiang FC (CHN)
– ۳rd in 2023 Chinese Super League
– ۲ ACL appearances
– ۱st ACL Two appearance
Port FC (THA)
– ۳rd in 2023/24 Thai League 1
– ۱ ACL appearance
– ۲nd ACL Two appearance, first came in 2010
Lion City Sailors FC (SGP)
– ۲۰۲۳ Singapore Premier League runners-up
– ۱-time league champions
– ۲۰۲۳ Singapore Cup winners – ۱st title
– ۲ ACL appearances
– ۱st ACL Two appearance
Persib Bandung (IDN)
-۲۰۲۳/۲۴ Indonesia Liga 1 champions – ۲nd title and 1st since 2014
– Reached Round of 16 in AFC Cup debut in 2015, their last appearance in AFC club competition
– ۲nd ACL Two appearance
Group G
Bangkok United (THA)
– ۲۰۲۳/۲۴ Thai FA Cup winners – first title
– ۲۰۲۳/۲۴ Thai League 1 runners-up
– ۱-time league winners (2006)
– ۳ ACL appearances
– ۱st ACL Two appearance
Nam Dinh FC (VIE)
– ۲۰۲۳/۲۴ V League 1 winners – ۲nd title and first since 1985
– ۱st ACL Two appearance
– Only team in the draw set to make their AFC Club Competition debut
Lee Man (HKG)
-۲۰۲۳/۲۴ Hong Kong Premier League champions- 1st title
-۲۰۲۲/۲۳ Hong Kong Premier League runners-up
-Two ACL Two appearances
Tampines Rovers FC (SGP)
– ۳rd in 2023 Singapore Premier League
– ۵-time league champions
– ۴-time quarter-finalists in AFC Cup (2005, 2006, 2007, 2016)
– ۱۳th ACL Two appearance
Group H
Jeonbuk Hyundai Motors FC (KOR)
– ۴th in 2023 K League 1
– Record 9-time league champions
– ۲-time ACL champions (2006, 2016)
– ۱۶ ACL appearances, most by any Korean club
– ۱st ACL Two appearance
Selangor FC (MAS)
– ۲۰۲۳ Malaysia Super League runners-up
– ۲-time league champions
– ۱-time quarter-finalists (2006)
– Returning to AFC club competition for first time since 2016 AFC Cup
– ۶th ACL Two appearance
Muangthong United (THA)
– ۵th in 2023/24 Thai League 1
– ۴-time league winners
– ۱-time AFC Cup semi-finalists (2010)
– Returning to AFC club competition for first time since 2011 AFC Cup
– ۳rd ACL Two appearance
Dynamic Herb Cebu FC (PHI)
– ۲۰۲۴ Philippines Football League runners-up
– Made AFC club competition debut in 2023/24 AFC Cup
– ۲nd ACL Two appearance
- نویسنده : محمد مهدی اسماعیلی رها
